document_data.name: Puck Caribdas
document_data.mainbody: '''Puck Caribdas''' was an [[elf|elven]] acolyte of [[Tymora]] and seller of [[potion]]s in the town of [[Leilon]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web/D&D Beyond/Sleeping Dragon's Wake}}
document_data.Description: Puck was physically delicate with a great deal of nervous energy.
document_data.Activities: When the [[Tymora Shrine (Leilon)|Tymora Shrine]] was erected in Leilon during [[Dagult Neverember]]'s efforts to rebuild the town, Puck assumed the duties of running the temple. In addtion, he began selling potions to the townsfolk and to visiting [[adventurer]]s, and was the only source of potions in town. He did not brew his merchandise, but instead received deliveries every tenday, usually of no more than four vials of any given type of potion.{{Cite web/D&D Beyond/Divine Contention}}
